name: extensionExists
description: This function checks if a specific extension exists.

lucee.notes: This function was added as part of the Admin Interface improvement.

examples.title: Simple ExtensionExists() Example
examples.description: This example shows a very basic usage of the function to determine if a function exists.

examples.title: Example of ExtensionExists() Using Version Attribute
examples.description: This example was created by Michael Born to verify that a specific version of an Extension exists.
